titleStmt.title: A learned and gracious sermon preached at Paules Crosse by that famous and iudicious diuine, Iohn Spenser ... ; published for the benefite of Christs vineyard, by H.M.
titleStmt.author: Spenser, John, 1559-1614.
Marshall, Hamlett.

publicationStmt.publisher: Imprinted by George Purslowe for Samuel Rande, and are to be solde at his shoppe neere Holborne Bridge,

notesStmt.note: Caption title: Gods love to his vineyard.
Reproduction of original in the Henry E. Huntington Library and Art Gallery.
